data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azevedo-Santos, Valter M., Roxo, Fábio F. (2015): A new species of the genus Pareiorhina (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Loricariidae) from the upper rio Paraná basin, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3937 (2): 377-385, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3937.2.8
